author: sebb
msg: Drop some more faulty unresponsive mirrors

author: gokturk
msg: Couple of changes to make ComponentHub pure OSGI compliant in reconfiguration manner. And some refinements to decrease DoF on reconfiguration parameters:
* Helper flags on component factories are disabled and use of them removed from the code.(thread-safe, exclusive)
* Immutable property behaviour is changed. It is now only rejecting reconfigurations on immutable properties is component is created already.
* Reinstantiation of component on reconfiguration is disabled.

author: bvahdat
msg: Removed the obsolete usage of the CastUtils.cast(Iterator<?> p) utility.
